messages.title: Maintenance and Repairs on Your Estate
messages.content: Dear Resident, I've heard shocked to hear so many stories of poor maintenance and repairs by Islington Borough Council as I've been campaigning for the General Election on 7 May...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Alex Burghart expresses concern about the stories of poor maintenance and repairs by the Islington Borough Council and believes Islington residents deserve better.

housing.content: I've heard shocked to hear so many stories of poor maintenance and repairs by Islington Borough Council.

contactInformation.address: Islington Conservatives, 67 Halliford Street, London N1 3HF

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains a personal message from the candidate addressing the bad conditions of maintenance and repairs on the estate, encouraging residents to get in touch with him and expressing the importance of the upcoming election.
